channel.title: Error, help please
channel.description:
When i compile, i get no errors, but when i runserver i get this
[code]Loading npcs... drops... Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatExcept ion: For input string: "1305 " at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at NPCHandler.loadNPCDrops(NPCHandler.java:1202) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:426) at server.main(server.java:97)
[/code]
help please :confused:[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 27, 2008, 06:43:08 PM[/size][hr]someone, please? :(

item.title: Error, help please

item.description:
